name: Baldi's Basics SUPERSTAR EDITION
description:
Story: You Have Found A Super Star (Based Off Super Mario) And Now You Are VERY FAST.

This Mod Is Very Easy. You Just Have Multicolors, That They Don't Change They Are Just Multiple Cause I'm Lazy Coding Lol.

Have Fun.

Also:

WARNING: THE PLAYER IS USING CHEATS, & I'M P**SED OFF ABOUT IT!!

                   - Baldi

(No Swearing Allowed, You Can But You Need To Censor The Swear Words)

I Made The Player Fast And There Is Also The Super Star Music From Super Mario.

This Mod Is Very Short  Cause U Are VERY FAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAST!!!!!!

Decompile Mod Made With Unity 2020.3.25f1 (64-bit).
